params.sqlcmd: "select " +" NVL(SYS_ISSUE_INST_CD_CTRL.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", ' ') as \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", " +" NVL(SYS_ISSUE_INST_CD_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0) as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_ISSUE_INST\\", " +" NVL(SYS_OPR_INST_CD_CTRL.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\", ' ') as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" NVL(SYS_OPR_INST_CD_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0) as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_OPR_INST\\", " +" NVL(SYS_PUCH_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", ' ') as \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" NVL(SYS_PUCH_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0) as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_PUCH_ODR\\", " +" NVL(SYS_TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD_CTRL.\\"TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD\\", ' ') as \\"TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD\\", " +" NVL(SYS_TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0) as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_TRANSPORT_SLIP\\", " +" NVL(SYS_JOB_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"JOB_OD_CD_PREFIX\\", '') as \\"JOB_OD_CD_PREFIX\\", " +" NVL(SYS_JOB_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"JOB_OD_CD\\", ' ') as \\"JOB_OD_CD\\", " +" NVL(SYS_JOB_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0) as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_JOB_ODR\\", " +" NVL(SYS_WORK_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", ' ') as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" NVL(SYS_WORK_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0) as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_WORK_ODR\\", " +" NVL(SYS_EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD_CTRL.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD\\", ' ') as \\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD\\", " +" NVL(SYS_EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0) as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_EXTERNAL_PLAN\\" " +"from " +" SYS_ISSUE_INST_CD_CTRL, " +" SYS_OPR_INST_CD_CTRL, " +" SYS_PUCH_ODR_CD_CTRL, " +" SYS_TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD_CTRL, " +" SYS_JOB_ODR_CD_CTRL, " +" SYS_WORK_ODR_CD_CTRL, " +" SYS_EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD_CTRL, " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_ISSUE_INST_CD_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_OPR_INST_CD_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_PUCH_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_JOB_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_WORK_ODR_CD_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+)"
